biotools.summary:
BoltzMatch is machine-learning-based peptide-spectrum-matching scoring method for spectrum identification in tandem mass spectrometry, shotgun proteomics. Annotation of tandem mass spectrometry data using stochastic neural networks in shotgun proteomics.

Authors: Anastasia Voronkova, Pavel Sulimov, and Attila Kertesz-Farkas National Research University Higher School of Economics (HSE), Moscow, Russia.
